home.catch_phrase: Regardless of the tool, my job is to bring ideas to life by creating authentic and memorable experiences.

skills.DevelopText: I have developed several projects using technologies such as TypeScript and Node.js, but I always explore new options to elevate my work to higher levels. I have also worked on academic/personal projects involving embedded programming and image processing.
skills.UXDesignText: I use Figma to design intuitive interfaces and plan Design Systems that represent the project's purpose. Additionally, I always prioritize user needs while aiming for a smooth and seamless experience
skills.DesignText: My experience in graphic design revolves around creating memorable visual identities and marketing materials. Mastering the key tools of Adobe Creative Cloud, my dedication goes beyond aesthetics: it's about effectively conveying a message.
skills.VideoEditText: As a video editor and motion designer, my work involves crafting narratives to turn concepts into captivating stories. In each project, I strive for both visual and emotional excellence.

about.AboutText: I'm Luiz, a Front-End Web developer currently studying Computer Engineering at the Federal Technological University of Paran√°. Passionate about design and technology, I invest significant time in enhancing my expertise in these areas. A music enthusiast with a love for instruments, I uncovered my creative side early when a started freelancing in graphic design, editing, and motion. I live in a constant process of improvement and actively seek new skills to become a more versatile professional.
about.ToolsText: I enjoy exploring new tools and I'm always seeking to specialize in something new. Below, you can check out some of the technologies I have already used in personal and professional projects.

projects.ProjectsText: Check out some past projects I've worked on.

experience.NEES: Center for Excellence in Social Technologies

contact.ContactText: Have a question, proposal, or just want to say hello? Feel free to reach out!
contact.MessagePlaceholder: Your profile caught my attention and I'm interested in discussing a potential collaboration opportunity. Are you available for a brief chat?
